title: Online Physiology Fundamentals: Blended Learning Strategy Application

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational knowledge in life sciences
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining LMS-based asynchronous learning with weekly 30-minute live video sessions. Learners access videos, quizzes, discussion boards, and utilize digital tools like virtual microscopes/animations via personal devices

learning_goals: Complete over 80% of video learning materials explaining physiological processes at the cellular level (osmosis, enzyme action, etc.) and score 75 points or higher on formative assessments
Analyze tissue samples using the provided virtual microscope simulation and identify three basic tissue types (epithelial, connective, muscle) with 80% accuracy
Create a concept map linking actual physiological responses to physiological principles through weekly case study assignments, revise based on peer feedback, and submit the final version
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
